org.drip.state.curve

Class DerivedZeroRate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.discount.DiscountCurve
      • org.drip.state.discount.ZeroCurve
        • org.drip.state.curve.DerivedZeroRate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve, DiscountFactorEstimator, LatentState

    public class DerivedZeroRate
extends ZeroCurve
    DerivedZeroRate implements the delegated ZeroCurve functionality. Beyond discount factor/zero rate computation at specific cash pay nodes, all other functions are delegated to the embedded discount curve.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
